Events.OnCreate:
(block ( (playerLevel (korGetPlayerLevel)) destList destObj fitCount ) ; Get the list of all stations that we might visit. (setq destList (filter (sysFindObject aOwnerObj "TAF +populated; -occupation; -uncharted;") theDest ; The minimum travel distance depends on the player's level (and (geq (objGetDistance aOwnerObj theDest) (@ '(250 250 400 500 600) playerLevel)) (not (objGetData theDest 'noTraffic)) ) ) )
; Find out how many crates the player can carry (setq fitCount (objGetFitCount gPlayerShip (itmCreate &itKorolovShippingContainer; 2)))
(switch ; Finite number of missions per station (ls (objGetData aOwnerObj 'remainingMissions) 1) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only offer if the player has enough cargo space (ls fitCount 1) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Only offer to levels 2-3 (not (find '(2 3) playerLevel)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; No missions once the stronghold is destroyed (objIsAbandoned (objGetObjRefData aOwnerObj 'charonStronghold)) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Pick a random destination. If we can't find one there is no mission (not (setq destObj (random destList))) (msnDestroy gSource)
; Otherwise setup mission (block ( (pricePerContainer (* 10000 (random 5 10))) (cargoValue (* pricePerContainer fitCount)) cargo escortFee )
(setq cargo (itmSetProperty (itmCreate &itKorolovShippingContainer; fitCount) 'charges (/ pricePerContainer 25) ) ) ; Compute the fee that we will pay based on the value of the cargo (setq escortFee (/ (* 50 cargoValue) 10000))
; Adjust the fee randomly and round down to the nearest 50 (setq escortFee (intRoundDown (/ (* escortFee (random 75 125)) 100) 50 ) )
; Mission expires after a certain time (msnSetData gSource 'expiresOn (add (unvGetTick) (multiply 2 (sysCalcTravelTime (objGetDistance aOwnerObj destObj) (shpGetMaxSpeed gPlayerShip))) (random 400 1200) ) )
; Mission settings (msnSetData gSource 'destID (objGetID destObj))
(msnSetData gSource 'missionXP 50) (msnSetData gSource 'cargo cargo) (msnSetData gSource 'cargoValue cargoValue) (msnSetData gSource 'reward escortFee)
(msnRegisterForEvents gSource destObj) (msnRegisterForEvents gSource gPlayerShip) ) ) )
Events.OnAccepted:
(block Nil (objAddItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'cargo))
; Order the pirates (chrRaidTransport gPlayerShip (objGetObjByID (msnGetProperty gSource 'ownerID)) (objGetObjByID (msnGetData gSource 'destID)) (msnGetData gSource 'cargoValue) ) )
Events.OnCompleted: (block Nil (msnSetData gSource 'state gData) (switch ; Penalty if player was late (= gData 'late) (typIncData &unidKorolovEscort; 'xp -50) ; Blacklist if player lost / stole cargo (= gData 'lost) (block Nil (typSetData &unidKorolovEscort; 'level -1) (typSetData &unidKorolovEscort; 'xp -1) ) ) )
Events.OnObjDestroyed:
(switch (= aObjDestroyed gPlayerShip) (block Nil ; Remove any shipping containers from the player ship (enum (objGetItems gPlayerShip "* +unid:&itKorolovShippingContainer;;") theItem (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip theItem) ) (msnFailure gSource 'playerDead) )
(= (objGetID aObjDestroyed) (msnGetData gSource 'destID)) (msnFailure gSource 'targetDead) )
Events.OnDeliveryMissionCompleted: (switch ; If the player has the cargo and time left then mission succeeds (and (objHasItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'cargo)) (gr (msnGetData gSource 'expiresOn) (unvGetTick)) ) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'cargo)) (msnSuccess gSource 'delivered) (msnTranslate gSource 'DeliverCargo) ) ; If the player delivers the cargo late then no reward (objHasItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'cargo)) (block Nil (objRemoveItem gPlayerShip (msnGetData gSource 'cargo)) (msnFailure gSource 'late) (msnTranslate gSource 'LateCargo) ) ; Otherwise failure (block Nil (msnFailure gSource 'lost) (msnTranslate gSource 'LostCargo) ) )
